property.name: configName
property.label: Display Configuration
property.description: (Developer)Name of the Record Detail Configuration record to be used (see sfpegRecordDetail__mdt).

property.name: actionConfigName
property.label: Action Configuration
property.description: (Developer)Name of the Action Configuration record to be used for header actions (see sfpegAction__mdt).

property.name: maxSize
property.label: Max. #Actions Displayed
property.description: Max number of actions displayed before overflow in menu.

property.name: cardClass
property.label: Wrapping CSS
property.description: CSS classes to set on the wrapping component div

property.name: layoutMode
property.label: Layout Mode
property.description: Layout mode to be used for the display of field labels (inline, stacked or auto, i.e. based on user chosen density)

property.name: buttonSize
property.label: Button Size
property.description: Size of the standard header buttons (to align with custom header actions)

property.name: useLDS
property.label: Use LDS?
property.description: Use LDS instead of SOQL for record data fetch (for supported objects).

property.name: showRefresh
property.label: Show Refresh?
property.description: When using DML to fetch data, flag to display a refresh button.

property.name: isDebug
property.label: Debug?
property.description: Flag to show debug information.

property.name: isDebugFine
property.label: Debug (fine) ?
property.description: Flag to show debug information for all sub-components.
